        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">
                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

        <div class="grid-x bg-white grid-padding-x grid-padding-y" style="width: 100%; position: relative;" itemtype="http://schema.org/Product" itemscope><div class="cell small-12" id="toptop"><h1 <div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="59836" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="59836" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">3.85</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="1097">1,097</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="133"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>The Favourite</b> by <b>Penhaligon's</b> is a Floral Woody Musk fragrance for women. <b>The Favourite</b> was launched in 2020. The nose behind this fragrance is Alienor Massenet. Top notes are Violet, Freesia and Mandarin Orange; middle notes are Mimosa, Iris and Jasmine Sambac; base notes are Musk, Ambroxan and Sandalwood. </p><div v-pre class='fragrantica-blockquote'><p>"The stage is set, the setting is Blenheim. The story concerns the mother of this majestic Palace. Her scent fills the Royal Quarters as golden mimosa sways society's opinion. She greets with a darling smile, charming and coy, innocent as a wildflower. Yet, layers peel away like mandarin and bergamot. Smoke and mirrors. Iris and musk. Manoeuvres and mystery create the most wonderful of palaces. But what goes on in the shadows? Behind closed doors? Leave it to her, its better that way. Jasmine toys with ones heart-strings as she begins to emerge upon a sandalwood stage." <em>from the brand</em></p></div><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about                     Presence of mimosa may be overwhelming for some

</fragram-photos-wrapper><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-padding-y" id="pyramid"><div class="cell"><div style="display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; text-align: center; background: white;"><div class="strike-title"><span>Perfume Pyramid</span></div><pyramid-switch :perfume_id="59836"><pyramid-notes title="Main Notes According to Your Votes"></pyramid-notes><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Top Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="top"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.116.jpg" style="width: 5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Violet-116.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Violet</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.88630790722059; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.94.jpg" style="width: 3.225rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Freesia-94.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Freesia</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.77716431896851; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.82.jpg" style="width: 2.675rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Mandarin-Orange-82.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Mandarin Orange</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Middle Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="middle"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.167.jpg" style="width: 4.85rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Mimosa-167.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Mimosa</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.99049106974986; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.11.jpg" style="width: 3.925rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Iris-11.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Iris</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.76557320030326; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.14.jpg" style="width: 2.625rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Jasmine-14.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Jasmine Sambac</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Base Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="base"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.4.jpg" style="width: 4.425rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Musk-4.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Musk</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.77716431896851; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.563.jpg" style="width: 2.675rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Ambroxan-563.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Ambroxan</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.73508893593265; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.33.jpg" style="width: 2.5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Sandalwood-33.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Sandalwood</div></div></div>

</div><div class="cell small-12"><div class="strike-title"><span><small>Collections</small> British Tales</span></div><div class="carousel"><div class="carousel-cell"><a     <div class="strike-title"><span>All Reviews By Date</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
        <div class="cell destinationreview"></div>                    <div id="parent2358403" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2358403" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Renardz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2235112"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2235112.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Renardz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Vilhelm-Parfumerie/Mango-Skin-49305.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.49305.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mango Skin"title="Mango Skin"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2358403ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2358403" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2235112">Renardz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-23">11/23/24 03:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>What a fragrance. Feminine, powdery, youthful, clean, gentle, playful yet regal, lightly flirty. Flowery and musky, inoffensive. Uplifting with 0 sharp edges.<br />
<br />
I would imagine a girl from a Sofia Coppola movie wearing this. It's not even clear if you're a modern soft girl or an 18th century noble. Whimsical indeed.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="2358403"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=2358403#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2357575" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="2357575"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=2357575#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2357148" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2357148" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rendezvous"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1942839"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1942839.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="rendezvous" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2357148ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2357148" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1942839">rendezvous</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-21">11/21/24 21:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Beautifully blended, beautifully crafted. Its a soft, girly perfume. Opens with fresh freesias, dries down to a very well combined mix of violets, iris and mimosa. Delightful, coquettish, fun but safe.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="2357148"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=2357148#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2349323" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2349323" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="EaudeBisous"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2314528"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2314528.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="EaudeBisous" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2349323ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2349323" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2314528">EaudeBisous</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-14">11/14/24 19:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was expecting a lot from that. I met with Penhaligons lately and after Constance, The Favourite was my second one which I wanted to try most. I tried for a day and it literally gone after 1-1.5 hour. The longevity is just a disappointment. <br />
<br />
The scent changed on me, when I smelled in the store on the paper, it was very flowery and intriguing. But on me, it was just like a chemical cleaning product - and I didnt like that. <br />
<br />
From the British Tales collection, I still want to try Luna, but I got that I shouldnt put my expectations very high.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="2349323"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=2349323#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2341466" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2341466" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Binniebleu"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1426490"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1426490.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Binniebleu" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ghost/Ghost-Deep-Night-1536.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1536.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ghost Deep Night"title="Ghost Deep Night"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2341466ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2341466" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1426490">Binniebleu</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-07">11/07/24 18:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like a pink bubble bath</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="2341466"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=2341466#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82); padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6" v-pre>
</div></div><div id="parent2330465" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2330465" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="marshmallowbunny"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1398132"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1398132.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="marshmallowbunny" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dolce-Gabbana/Dolce-Gabbana-Pour-Femme-15335.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.15335.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dolce&Gabbana Pour Femme"title="Dolce&Gabbana Pour Femme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2330465ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2330465" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1398132">marshmallowbunny</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-28">10/28/24 14:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The Favourite is a primarily floral fragrance with a fruity edge. Its very true to the notes listed, though for me the mandarin is far more pronounced than Fragrantica has suggested. Personally, I dont get powdery from this. If annything, its musky. Imo powder fragrances need more than a simple violet note to reach that romantic, nostalgic powder finish. This is the kind of scent youd reach for in a hurry when theres little time to figure out which fragrance to wear. Or one youd choose mindlessly at the Sephora counter when you forget to pack a perfume for vacation. While its pleasant and inoffensive, it doesnt captivate me. Its actually quite boring tbh. Its a perfectly nice daily fragrance/signature scent, but it would be redundant for someone who already has a perfectly nice daily fragrance/signature scent that they  love. Unlike other perfumes with powdery profiles, The Favourite lacks a distinct character that evokes an aura or tells a story. The mandarin/orange blossom and floral combination at this point is all too familiar. Its at its most appealing during the drydown when the musky and sensual qualities take over the fragrance, however the addition of the contemporary horror known as AMBROXAN does it no favors. During times of regency, there was no Ambroxan. The moment I detect Ambroxan in a fragrance, any notion of it being vintage inspired or reminiscent of bygone eras is swiftly dispelled from my mind. If you belong to the minority that gets a sour, ammonia like smell from Ambroxan heavy scents (think BR540 and Burberry Her), it may be wise to avoid this fragrance altogether. While The Favourite is by no means an Ambroxan bomb, the note is apparent at the 2 hour mark and becomes borderline unbearable after just three hours.<br />
<br />
Despite the enchanting branding, the fragrance itself feels conventional, missing that unique spark and individuality. Reading Penhaligons description, I was expecting something whimsical, charming, and regal that would spark a touch of fantasy. A scent fit for a princess. And I just dont get that vibe from this fragrance. Instead, its just a safe, underwhelming basic that you could wear with a white baby tee and a nice pair of jeans. This would be a great pick for someone dipping a toe into powdery fragrances or for those who shy away frm super powdery perfumes. To put it simply, this is a powdery perfume for people who dont actually like powdery perfumes. By no means am I saying that this fragrance smells cheap, it doesnt, but it most definitely doesnt exude a $235 essence either. I suspect much of the cost goes into its beautiful bottle, which sadly is the most special aspect of this perfume. I cant help but feel underwhelme by the trend of dressing simple scents in opulent bottles, an allure that often compensates for an otherwise ordinary fragrance. As visual beings were drawn to such enticing packaging, but for me, the beauty of this bottle doesnt redeem the uninspired scent within. The name The Favourite makes perfect sense. Its not that youre cherished for your unique personality, eccentric habits, and irreplaceable qualities, but rather favored for a universally appealing facade and an unhealthy, relentless drive to people please at all costs. I get it now.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="2330465"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=2330465#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2326708" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2326708" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ejayne64"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2298067"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ejayne64" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2326708ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2326708" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2298067">ejayne64</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-24">10/24/24 19:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was so surprised I didn't like this! I don't necessarily dislike the fragrance, especially in the eventual dry down, but it was ever changing and not in a good way on me. It went from pretty floral, to heavy floral, to cleaning product style scent, to sweeter floral. I get the powdery vibe, but it wasn't the smoothest of blends to my nose. Nothing stood out to me in the dry down, not a special fragrance from Penhaligon's and most certainly not my "Favourite" from their line.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="2326708"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=2326708#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2314048" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2314048" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Petally"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2285257"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Petally" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2314048ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2314048" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2285257">Petally</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-13">10/13/24 01:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love it. The over the top bottle is how it smells, silly gorgeous.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="2314048"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=2314048#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2299395" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/67827">rylai</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-31">08/31/24 01:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It is flowery, not powdery. It is too disappointing :/</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="2266661"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=2266661#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2265525" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2265525" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="honeybee46"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2237243"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="honeybee46" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2265525ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2265525" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2237243">honeybee46</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-30">08/30/24 01:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I bought the miniature collection. Among the five in the collection, this is the scent that I prefer the most. It is very powdery and easily wearable. However, if you want to stand out, this may not be the scent for you.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="2265525"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=2265525#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2262604" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2262604" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jenla"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1379281"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1379281.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jenla" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Montale/Vanilla-Cake-48948.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.48948.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vanilla Cake"title="Vanilla Cake"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2262604ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2262604" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1379281">Jenla</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-27">08/27/24 09:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a very identifiable Penhaligons fragrance. It's feminine, floral, light, fun, youthful but in a classy way. A bit of a rogue one, but it reminds me a lot of minty yogurt that you tend to get as an appetizer dip at Indian restaurants... and I love it! The downfall however is the sillage and longevity, initially it packs a punch but give it about an hour or two and it's a very close to the skin scent, give it a few more hours and you may as well not be wearing a fragrance at all. Given the price point of Penhaligons, it's truly shocking performance and really drags down what could be a great feminine spring staple. <br />
<br />
Scent: 7/10<br />
Projection: 2/10<br />
Longevity: 2/10<br />
Versatility: 7/10 (Although I see it as a spring scent, if the longevity was better this could be a pretty decent everyday/office scent since it's fairly inoffensive)<br />
Price (at full price): 5/10 <br />
<br />
Overall: 4.6/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="2262604"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=2262604#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2261667" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2261667" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Hgf2008"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2032817"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Hgf2008" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2261667ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2261667" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2032817">Hgf2008</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-26">08/26/24 12:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A lovely delicate feminine wisp of a perfume, bringing to mind a lady doing her makeup in a fluffy dressing gown at a traditional vanity. Not a big performer - it retreats to virtually a skin scent after a few hours - but it lasts a deceptively long time in that mode. I sprayed at around 10am at as of 8pm, can still detect a faint sweet smell on the skin. Pleasant and discrete. For those who like this sort of profile, I could see it suiting both daytime and evening wear, and most climates as well.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="2261667"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=2261667#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2261464" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; You'd have to keep reapplying to smell something at all.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="2261464"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=2261464#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2259187" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I had a sample and immediately snagged a bottle because I fell head over heels. It's very rare for me to encounter that type of feeling, but this was a NEED rather than a want.<br />
<br />
I knew I'd like it from the scent profile. It's pretty, floral, powdery, very purple... if you know, you know. If you hate powder, stay away.<br />
<br />
Edit: It smells very similar (to me) to a candle called 'fairy dust' that is sold in the UK.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="2259187"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=2259187#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2255125" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It has a lotion-like or baby powder/baby wipe type of quality. Leans mature &amp; feminine, with a very purple, powdery iris in the dry down. Not my style, and I don't like it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="2255125"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=2255125#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2252475" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2252475" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="luthienstar"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1363940"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1363940.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="luthienstar" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mizensir/Solar-Blossom-55263.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.55263.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Solar Blossom"title="Solar Blossom"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2252475ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2252475" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1363940">luthienstar</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-17">08/17/24 13:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I really wanted to like this but it was headache inducing for me, and I had to wash it off.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="2252475"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=2252475#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2246987" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2246987" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Enrium"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/36833"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.36833.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Enrium" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Glossier/You-46885.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.46885.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="You"title="You"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2246987ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2246987" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/36833">Enrium</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-12">08/12/24 13:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>On the few occasions I have gone into a Penhaligon's store, The Favourite seems to be their go-to recommendation. The fact that it is an understated  crowdpleaser is most likely the reason for this, rather than it reflecting my personality in any way. It is so safe that it is dull, despite being a reasonably pleasant, good-quality scent. Iris is one of my favourite notes, but it is barely detectable here.<br />
<br />
TF is a sheer, powdery floral, sweet and airy, just about managing to not appear thin. The mimosa is sweet and powdery but isn't as rounded as I'd like. Some soft violet joins it, marrying well with the mimosa, being equally sweet and powdery. The slightly aquatic white florals follow, sweet and slightly wan. Clean musk permeates this scent, and it fades to an ambroxan skin scent, sweet, soft and musky until final fade. Sillage is intimate and longevity is moderate at a push. It is a feminine spring/summer daytime scent.<br />
<br />
A light, inoffensive powdery floral, TF is nothing exciting, but is a good subtle feminine scent, but is overpriced for what it is. Far from being my Favourite, but not bad. 3/5.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="2246987"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=2246987#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2240319" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2019263">L&oslash;pasdfkdf</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-06">08/06/24 01:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a perfume for a bride.Its powdery but not too much. Its girly, delicate, soft and gentle. Its a lot of mimosa and iris. Its not a beast and can be a signature perfume. Its not offensive and its a perfume that only a good inocent girl can wear.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="2240319"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=2240319#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2218421" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2218421" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Featherblossom"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1722364"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1722364.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Featherblossom" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mugler/Angel-Elixir-78581.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.78581.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Angel Elixir"title="Angel Elixir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2218421ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2218421" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1722364">Featherblossom</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-14">07/14/24 10:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The opening is lovely! It's very well blended and has a fresh, rejuvenating air to it.<br />
<br />
Unfortunately the orange, freesia and jasmine do not last long, leaving me with a powdery violet skin scent. For the price, it's not really worth it. It's also a pretty common scent profile, it reminds me of a weaker, less screechy and better blended member of the LPRN family.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="2218421"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=2218421#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2211826" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2211826" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="UrbanKoala"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2137929"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2137929.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="UrbanKoala" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Classique-427.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.427.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Classique"title="Classique"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2211826ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2211826" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2137929">UrbanKoala</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-08">07/08/24 08:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Maybe mine has sat around for longer because it is gorgeous and also has an almost Raspberry-like top note instead of Mandarin Orange. I'm not sure if it's my body chemistry but this lasts all day on me, based on these comments, it tends to not stay on others very long. The Violet, Freesia, and Mimosa are what I smell the most, it leans dangerously close to "baby powder/baby wipes" but I think it works very well. Price is insane, I was lucky to get this for around $80 but there is no reason for a skin scent to be this high in price. Also I would add that though I am in love with the scent it isn't that complex and it's from such a great house you would expect a lot more from them.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="2211826"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=2211826#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2198507" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2198507" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LuckiestCat"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2160071"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2160071.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="LuckiestCat" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Luna-38351.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.38351.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Luna"title="Luna"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2198507ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2198507" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2160071">LuckiestCat</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-24">06/24/24 18:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was considering buying this because when I smelled it on paper, it immediately brought to mind a young and haughty ingenue. The florals are not too much, they are coquettish. However, when I spray it on myself, it is smells like a strong and almost generic sharp floral at first, and then it disappears within 3 hours. So I don't think it's worth it at that price point. I've tried it twice, but maybe 3rd time's the charm?</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="2198507"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=2198507#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2195839" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2195839" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Millybow"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1164327"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Millybow" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2195839ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2195839" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1164327">Millybow</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-22">06/22/24 03:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Absolutely love this, it is strong, sweet yet somehow sheer and gauzy at the same time, it leaves a really beautiful trail and the dry down is so velvety. It brings images of ballerinas in sheer delicate light pink and lilac tulle. I love it so much that Ive ordered the full size bottle and the matching body products too.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="2195839"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=2195839#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2193322" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2193322" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="GcnbJ"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1159193"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1159193.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="GcnbJ" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Burberry/Goddess-Intense-95883.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.95883.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Goddess Intense"title="Goddess Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2193322ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2193322" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1159193">GcnbJ</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-19">06/19/24 13:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a beautiful fragrance. If it wasn't love at first sight (or smell) it grows on me. It is powdery, and I really enjoy the violet, iris and mimosa notes. It reminds me of Flower by Kenzo edp in spite of having no incense note, but is more subtle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="2193322"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=2193322#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2192804" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Not my personal cup of tea but would be perfect for a certain type of person.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="2192804"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=2192804#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2189477" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Violets, mimosa and jasmine extra.<br />
Its also too sweet and cloying.<br />
Looking at the notes, i thought this was going to be definite like, however, it reminds me of another common day perfume, I cannot recall. Slightly powdery. This is a floral sugarbomb.<br />
With all the flowers listed, I smell sweet vanilla on top.<br />
Wash/scrub off for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="2189477"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=2189477#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2183857" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2146143" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Emang"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1930575"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1930575.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Emang" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Feve-Gourmande-87746.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.87746.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fve Gourmande"title="Fve Gourmande"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2146143ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2146143" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1930575">Emang</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-05">05/05/24 01:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A very expensive skin scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="2146143"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=2146143#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2140634" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2140634" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Phylira"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1250337"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1250337.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Phylira" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.59836.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Favourite"title="The Favourite"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2140634ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2140634" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1250337">Phylira</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-29">04/29/24 21:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Oh, this one is quite unique. This is what modern royalty smells like. Crisp white linens, heirloom pearl necklaces. A mother and daughter playing with expensive, porcelain dolls. Afternoon tea. So luxurious. Clean, fresh, feminine, youthful. Not a safe blind buy, as you have to love the type of soapy smells that you can taste a little when sprayed. This is a top contender for my wedding perfume this June at an Irish castle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="2140634"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=2140634#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2132432" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
