I prefer Penhaligon's Elizabethan Rose by a long shot.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="2130715"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=2130715#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2126541" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2126541" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="CynicalPink"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1924789"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1924789.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="CynicalPink" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Commodity/Book-50618.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.50618.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Book"title="Book"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2126541ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2126541" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1924789">CynicalPink</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-16">04/16/24 11:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I loved the opening  mimosa and violet straight off the bat for me, with maybe a little Iris. Deep into the dry down (about 4 hours in), some of that bright sweetness faded to something different that my newbie nose cant identify. Is it the ambroxan? More than anything, it reminds me of how brand new Cabbage Patch dolls smelled when I was a kid. <br />
<br />
Im happy with my travel spray that I got as a promotional gift, but I dont think Id invest in a bottle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="2126541"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=2126541#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2123968" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2123968" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="astralmonad870"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1555935"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1555935.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="astralmonad870" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dries-Van-Noten/Jardin-de-L-Orangerie-72594.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.72594.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Jardin de L'Orangerie"title="Jardin de L'Orangerie"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2123968ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2123968" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1555935">astralmonad870</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-13">04/13/24 17:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>To the reviewer who said this is exactly like Marc Jacobs Perfect, I'm not sure if your judgment can be trusted. Perfect has rhubarb and almond. This has none of those notes and it's a primarily floral scent achieved with mimosa and violet as the main notes. The two perfumes share exactly nothing except for being powdery in different ways.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="2123968"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=2123968#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2101470" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2101470" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Amen! It's almost identical, if not better blended as Narciso Poudree which gets 4.1 rating! These two are not only comparable, they are almost the same to an untrained nose. Is it the difference in price range? The slightly overpriced Penhaligon's could be rubbing people the wrong way, perhaps? I, for one, love Favourite! It's just a pink cloudy fluffy feel-good bliss!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="2101470"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=2101470#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2070352" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It is pleasant but a bit weak and somewhat generic.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="2070352"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=2070352#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2063959" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/267736">meama</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-16">02/16/24 05:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very simple clean musky floral, too much shampoo-like....very 21'century girly and nothing like a 1800 favourite</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2054689" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="miimiis"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1723324"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1723324.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="miimiis" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2054689ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2054689" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1723324">miimiis</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-07">02/07/24 04:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A very simple scent. To me it just smells like shampoo, clean, not-sophisticated at all. I'm guessing very easy to dupe, glad I didn't buy a full bottle. I would say it's a safe blind buy since it's a pleasant shampoo scent that isn't going to offend anyone, but if you're looking for a fragrance to really love maybe test this one first.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; What it's giving: Victoria's Secret.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="2054571"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=2054571#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2048651" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2044037" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="violxttx"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1387081"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1387081.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="violxttx" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Chance-Eau-Fraiche-1483.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1483.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Chance Eau Fraiche"title="Chance Eau Fraiche"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2044037ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2044037" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1387081">violxttx</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-27">01/27/24 17:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The Favourite is giving the sophisticated lady in her 50s vibe, with big sunglasses and elegant dress. Smells like expensive and 100x upgraded version of Rose Enchanteur (which my grandma used to love wearing). Not a safe blind buy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="2044037"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=2044037#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2041726" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2041726" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Plantastica"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1796048"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Plantastica" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2041726ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2041726" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1796048">Plantastica</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-25">01/25/24 11:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Not blind buy safe. <br />
<br />
To me, this is giving stale, musty, dusty grandparents attic. <br />
Youre sitting in the attic browsing photo albums of long deceased relatives, the smell of old paper lingering in the air. Youre opening leather suitcases stuffed with grandmas long forgotten vintage clothes from her youth, still smelling faintly like the floral perfume she used to wear. Youre breaking the seals on old fashioned cosmetics that expired decades ago but have been sitting there, never used.  <br />
<br />
Nothing clean, playful, fresh or sexy about this one  not to my nose anyway. In fact I find it rather heavy. Not in a terrible way. Nostalgic and evocative of times gone by for sure, but I would not want to wear it on a daily basis. <br />
<br />
Starting to arrive to the conclusion that Mimosa is not a pleasant note for me personally (hated JM Mimosa and Cardamom). Or perhaps it could be the violet as well. <br />
<br />
Wanted to love it, but in reality I can only just about tolerate it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="2041726"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=2041726#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2039996" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2039996" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JoyDivision"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1580180"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1580180.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JoyDivision" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Miss-Dior-Blooming-Bouquet-23280.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.23280.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Miss Dior Blooming Bouquet"title="Miss Dior Blooming Bouquet"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2039996ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2039996" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1580180">JoyDivision</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-23">01/23/24 17:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Excuse me, does anyone else get 'grandma's-old-leather-bag-with-uncapped-lipstick-tissues' vibes or is it just me? Plus, there's a metallic note that makes me actually think that the bag contains old keys too.... Blind buy because we decided to spend the autumn on a remote Greek island and I had to kill time with something. I will open it up again at some point in the future and try to contemplate on what exactly I'm smelling because it's like the whole cosmetics' department together and nothing in particular. Not to mention the grandma's bag note to it....</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="2039996"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=2039996#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2021060" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2021060" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cookygirl"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/874574"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="cookygirl" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lancome/Idole-Aura-67578.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.67578.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Idle Aura"title="Idle Aura"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2021060ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2021060" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/874574">cookygirl</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-05">01/05/24 05:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I agree that this smells very similar to MJ Perfect.<br />
However, Perfect works better for me. It doesn't have the ambroxan which unfortunately ruins this otherwise really lovely scent.<br />
This would have been a winner for me if not for that dreaded gasoline smell.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="2021060"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=2021060#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2015515" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="2015515"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=2015515#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2013264" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2013264" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kikolja"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1847843"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1847843.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="kikolja" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2013264ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2013264" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1847843">kikolja</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-28">12/28/23 11:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells exactly like Marc Jacob's Perfect only with a higher percentage of oils than alcohol. Other than that I smell no difference. Might as well save yourself the dime. The only teeny tiny difference that I can maybe say is there: one could argue that Perfect exudes a livelier quality than The Favourite, attributed to the oil-to-alcohol ratio. On the other hand, The Favourite imparts a more subdued demeanor due to its higher oil content. However, aside from these nuances, if you possess one, acquiring the other seems unnecessary. I have a substantial collection of niche fragrances and am inclined towards diversifying my olfactory portfolio rather than acquiring existing options solely based on perceived luxury due to pricing.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="2013264"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=2013264#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2010507" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2010507" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kestrele"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1864054"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1864054.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="kestrele" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/By-Kilian/Princess-90174.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.90174.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Princess"title="Princess"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2010507ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2010507" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1864054">kestrele</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-25">12/25/23 16:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I like this. It's a nice, clean, shampoo-like floral with an interesting herbal edge to it. I almost smell something spicy or bitter, maybe just some sort of sharpness, but I'm not sure what. That note, whatever it is, makes this perfume more mature and sets it apart from others. It reminds me of Glossier You in a way, but they're not actually that similar-- maybe it's just the iris? Either way, it's very pretty. <br />
However I do find it to be overpriced. I bought a 10ml travel size secondhand, and while I like it, and I don't see myself repurchasing the full size. I get the feeling that this could be duped, or at least that plenty of other perfumes share the same vibe. I wouldn't make it my signature fragrance, but I can see it being an easy go-to for spring or summer.<br />
I recommend trying a sample or a small bottle before purchasing the full size.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="2010507"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=2010507#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1994070" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1994070" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bleuetfane"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1738697"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1738697.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="bleuetfane" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1994070ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1994070" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1738697">bleuetfane</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-06">12/06/23 10:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>For the first couple months (middle of the summer), this was a very fresh, juicy mandarin - pretty and great for the weather, but not at all what I hoped for, and it left me greatly disappointed. Ive tried it again in late fall and it was exactly what I hoped for - sweet, powdery violets, with no lipsticky or make-up quality to it, nothing outdated or old lady-ish but evergreen, so feminine and youthful, with that tiniest playful mandarin in the background giving it a little pang of zest to keep it fresh. This is what I imagine Cecily Cardew from Importance of Being Earnest to wear. Its truly a favourite and has since become my signature scent. If you enjoy dusty rose knitted sweaters and lace collared blouses of the early 1900s, velvet ribbons and white tights, perhaps this can be a favourite for you, too.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1994070"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1994070#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1988810" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1988810" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Endi1geida"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1418761"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1418761.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Endi1geida" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Masque-Milano/Times-Square-43833.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.43833.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Times Square"title="Times Square"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1988810ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1988810" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1418761">Endi1geida</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-30">11/30/23 05:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I cannot smell mimosa in this, which is confusing since it is the most voted ingredient on Fragrantica. I get a fresh white floral opening mixed with mandarin that makes it more interesting. Soon the mandarin fades and all you have left is a mix of white florals which dominate the scent for hours. No mimosa, no musk, no sandalwood. <br />
<br />
To be honest it is a good fragrance, nothing bad about it. Just disappointing since it is called the Favorite and it is not my favorite... idk what I was expecting it to be, but maybe something more memorable. <br />
<br />
Maybe a 7/10?? Idk, not sure</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1988810"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1988810#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1953022" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1790182">AmandaPandolphi</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-16">10/16/23 04:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Esse perfume s funciona em climas mais frios. Moro no Brasil e passei para trabalhar. No incio ele foi muito gostoso, embora no seja um cheiro espetcular, ainda era gostoso, mas com o passar do dia e a transpirao moderada da pele comeou ficar com um cheiro horrvel, eu s queria ir para casa tomar banho.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1953022"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1953022#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1947972" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1947972"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1947972#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1938770" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1938770" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sandra_101"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1674985"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1674985.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sandra_101" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Frederic-Malle/Carnal-Flower-1024.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1024.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Carnal Flower"title="Carnal Flower"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1938770ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1938770" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1674985">sandra_101</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-27">09/27/23 12:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Charming woody, powdery violet. It's old world without being old fashioned, in part because there's a very contemporary woody-amber note in there. That's also what makes it a like for me rather than a love; I'm not a huge fan of that ubiquitous woody amber.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1938770"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1938770#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1933643" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1933643" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="astralmonad870"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1555935"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1555935.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="astralmonad870" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dries-Van-Noten/Jardin-de-L-Orangerie-72594.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.72594.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Jardin de L'Orangerie"title="Jardin de L'Orangerie"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1933643ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1933643" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1555935">astralmonad870</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-21">09/21/23 10:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Warning: this perfume is only suitable for colder weather, as it will give you a headache in the spring and summer months! I've only used about 5 ml of my 30 ml bottle I bought a year ago, but I really love the lotion version of this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1933643"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1933643#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1927902" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1927902" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="COLOREDGIRLSHUFFLE"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1341923"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1341923.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="COLOREDGIRLSHUFFLE" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rochas/Eau-de-Rochas-2361.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.2361.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eau de Rochas"title="Eau de Rochas"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1927902ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1927902" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1341923">COLOREDGIRLSHUFFLE</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-14">09/14/23 12:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Oh my god, this is sexy. It reminds me of JPG's Scandal by Night, sans the dark cherry note. It's brighter and sweeter but still substantial. It creeps like a floral ambergris cloud and is so impeccably well-blended that I only catch whiffs of jasmine, freesia, and violet notes here and there.  Of course, the ambergris-esque and musk dry down is heavenly. Longevity is great, and sillage is arm's length. This is a great Penhaligon addition.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1927902"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1927902#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1922874" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1922874" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="deeshla57"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1810622"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="deeshla57" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Memo-Paris/Inverness-83482.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.83482.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Inverness"title="Inverness"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1922874ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1922874" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1810622">deeshla57</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-08">09/08/23 10:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Judging by the notes, the bottle/packaging and the whole vibe, I figured this was one I wouldn't like. Oh, but I was wrong! I am completely in love with this fragrance. It is powdery and only slightly sweet - the violet and iris work perfectly in this composition. Powdery without being cloying or overwhelming. Soft without being a skin scent. This one has projection and is long-lasting (for me). But I don't feel I am overly perfumed or obvious about it. It sort of strikes that balance between clean and professional + soft and feminine. The dry down is a pleasant muskiness - but I find that the iris lingers long. . .  Love it!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1922874"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1922874#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1912114" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1912114" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="that1makeupgirl"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/893154"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="that1makeupgirl" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1912114ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1912114" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/893154">that1makeupgirl</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-26">08/26/23 11:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance purchase was inspired by nostalgia and the memory of my mother wearing Givenchy Amarige. Smells very similar, with a hit of violet that sits just right on the skin. Feminine, elegant, sweet.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1912114"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1912114#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1903455" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Got me hooked to Penhaligons this one! However I have moved on to Empressa and Luna.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1903455"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1903455#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1893038" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1893038" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="emay20"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1621984"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1621984.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="emay20" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1893038ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1893038" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1621984">emay20</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-03">08/03/23 01:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The Favourite, although it is not my favorite perfume, is the closest one to my heart and the one that I will treasure forever because this is my wedding scent.<br />
I can't describe the smell of the fragrance itself other than it being powdery, but I can tell you the vibe it gives: It is a modern vintage fragrance.<br />
I can imagine a young lady wearing this and also a lady of a certain age. I can imagine this smell existing in the 1900s worn by a royal. I can also imagine a modern day lady - very prim and proper who comes from a wealthy (maybe old money) family.<br />
Poor performance on me though, and but with moderate projection. I tried to over sprayed it once (so as to compensate with the poor performance) when we went on cruise ship and it gave me headache.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1893038"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1893038#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1890900" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1890900" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Rosiewebber"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1480732"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Rosiewebber" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1890900ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1890900" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1480732">Rosiewebber</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-31">07/31/23 03:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Hmm. Violet is probably my favourite note, but Im not getting it here. <br />
Clean, creamy, soapy florals. So creamy and soapy in fact, that I might as well be wearing a bar of Dove soap. Thats what it smells like to me. Dove. Not necessarily a bad thing, just not what I was expecting from this? I wanted violets. <br />
Ill keep trying with it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1890900"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1890900#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1875440" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1875440" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Steph_rose00125"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1774759"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Steph_rose00125" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1875440ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1875440" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1774759">Steph_rose00125</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-10">07/10/23 08:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It smells like an old lady. Very overpowering and powdery. It is also a very heavy smell</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1875440"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1875440#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1873410" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1873410" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="nm999"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1394514"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1394514.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="nm999" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1873410ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1873410" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1394514">nm999</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-07">07/07/23 10:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Elegant and pretty, The Favorite is my most loved perfume. I live in a humid climate, and surprisingly, it holds up well in the summer heat. All of Penhaligon's perfumes have an old world charm to them, which I find endearing, but is not for everyone. Unless you are use to the perfume house, I would recommend sampling. There is also a very understated sexiness to this perfume, many male friends and coworkers compliment the smell. I think it's because it settles into a very clean, yet feminine smell. The pink ribbon around the perfume is very representative of the fragrance. The mimosa gives a fuzzy element, and if this perfume was a color, it would defiantly be the pink/mauvy color of the ribbon (instead of a purple color that would be expected with such a violet dominated scent).  The Favorite is also unique since I live in the US, and not many wear violet fragrances.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1873410"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1873410#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1872658" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1872658" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="CowLover99"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1786472"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="CowLover99" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dana/Love-s-Baby-Soft-9401.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.9401.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Love's Baby Soft"title="Love's Baby Soft"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1872658ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1872658" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1786472">CowLover99</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-06">07/06/23 11:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I liked this one. To me it smelled like a sharp and crisp floral scent, with a heavy violet presence in the fragrance, along with other floral scents. Maybe a bit of green scents thrown in as well.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1872658"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1872658#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1862910" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1862910" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="astralmonad870"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1555935"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1555935.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="astralmonad870" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dries-Van-Noten/Jardin-de-L-Orangerie-72594.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.72594.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Jardin de L'Orangerie"title="Jardin de L'Orangerie"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1862910ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1862910" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1555935">astralmonad870</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-23">06/23/23 11:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Just discovered the Nicholas Charles dupe of this which is pretty good. Ive tried Molinards Violet and Guerlains Flora Salvaggia but they do not compare in the slightest. This is the most purple-hued one of them all.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1862910"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1862910#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1861942" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1861942" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="creamyandlight"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1765277"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="creamyandlight" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1861942ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1861942" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79); Freshly cut flowers. Lightly sweet citrus. Clean, slightly herbal and soapy scent, but not too overwhelming. Not overly powdery either.<br />
Pretty boring, to be honest. It just fades into a powder. But pleasant nonetheless.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1861942"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1861942#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1854039" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1516766">CR95</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-10">05/10/23 12:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It smells really nice. Flowery and powdery. The iris is not overpowering in and old fashioned way...but like most Penhaligon's scents it just doesn't last. I tested their whole collection and only scents that actually last are the spicy, sweet or leathery ones. Everything else has a span of becoming a skin scent after 30 min. Very disappointing for this price.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1829680"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1829680#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1828230" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; One of my favorite fragrances that I own. I had a small bottle from a set, and instantly knew that I wanted a big bottle. I get compliments, nonstop, every time I wear it. Even without the compliments, it just makes me feel happy. I'd definitely buy a back up. The sillage is great and the longevity last about 6 hr on my skin and stay until laundry on my clothes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1828230"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1828230#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1826960" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1703303">MysticalArugula</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-08">04/08/23 00:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Such a youthful, elegant and adorable fragrance She is someone very polite well mannered, but has the most adorable smile that just makes you get butterflies in your stomach. This is such a fresh and almost aquatic fragrance coming from the violet- however the sweetness and elegance definitely comes from the freesia and sweet mandarin orange. If you're looking for a scent that makes you feel like you're wearing a cottagecore dress with a bow in your hair having a teaparty picnic- this is for you. Sillage is intimate/moderate and longevity is 8hours. <br />
<br />
Zodiac Trio<br />
Capricorn Libra Pisces/Aries</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1803504"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1803504#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1799461" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
