align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1796869"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1796869#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1791541" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1791541" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kotikina"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1498532"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1498532.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kotikina" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Attar-Collection/Khaltat-Night-38133.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.38133.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Khaltat Night"title="Khaltat Night"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1791541ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1791541" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1498532">Kotikina</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-24">03/24/23 09:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It is complex: feminine, classy, a little bit powdery. <br />
What I love about Penhaligon's - that their fragrances inspire my imagination and evoke images in my mind.<br />
<br />
I imagine an ingenue Victorian lady wearing this for a spring/summer ball. She comes from a good family, most likely aristocratic. Plays piano, paints, and is 'accomplished' as Victorians used to say. She is romantic enough to dream about love poems being dedicated to her, yet can come across a bit restrained and aloof: might fall in love, but will not lose her mind and do something indecent, such as eloping with a gentleman. Maybe Daphne from Bridgerton could rock it.<br />
<br />
Usually violet is a difficult note for me - as much as I wanted to love Guerlain's Insolence, it was just too much. The Favourite is strong on violet, but it is also quite strong on mimosa. There is some iris too, but very soft. Could be worn every day with an elegant outfit (definitely NOT jeans+trainers scent) or to the theatre. Noblesse oblige :) It is evocative of old times, but doesn't smell dated.<br />
<br />
As for the price tag: considering how expensive designers' fragrances became, this is a bargain (much cheaper than Penhaligon's portraits collection).<br />
The performance is actually excellent  - if you want sillage, it is there!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1791541"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1791541#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1790844" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1790844" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Muki Yair"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1653244"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1653244.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Muki Yair" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Empressa-Eau-de-Parfum-67818.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.67818.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Empressa Eau de Parfum"title="Empressa Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1790844ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1790844" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1653244">Muki Yair</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-23">03/23/23 12:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>one of the best perfumes I ever had ,extremely  classy elegant even regal and feminine  .<br />
every time I wear it i get highly complimented , and asked where I got this perfume<br />
<br />
it starts off very violet and flowery but yet powdery , the dry down brings out the musk and ambroxan which gives it a very long lasting effect , and hovers around you perfectly.<br />
not too powerful but yet has a very nice presence</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1790844"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1790844#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1775420" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1775420" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mejohann"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/196086"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.196086.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mejohann" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lubin/Black-Jade-13013.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.13013.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Black Jade"title="Black Jade"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1775420ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1775420" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/196086">mejohann</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-05">03/05/23 02:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Nope. This is a hard no for me. It seems okay to layer with other scents as it's a kind of generic citric-cedar, pretty unisex creation. It smells extremely similar to their "Vanities" collection, but almost a dead ringer for Lanvin's "Marry Me", except more synthetic and less high-quality smelling. On my skin Marry Me last a solid 2-3 hours longer at half the application volume. It's a projection artist, for sure. So it would probably last forever if you bought a bottle. But it's so generic that it's not remotely worth the price point for me. Marry Me has a refreshing peachy note that keeps it unique. The Favourite basically only has its packaging and brand reputation going for it. If you typically like Penhaligon's, this isn't their finest work among their modern formulations of the last 10ish years. I'm sure it smells lovely on some people, but it's such an overdone scent pyramid - citrus - rose-jasmine - cedarwood  - and it definitely is cedarwood, not sandalwood. <br />
<br />
At this point I'm not sure people know the difference between cedar and sandalwood. Unless you're really into wood notes and know the odors of the different varieties of each, it's probably pretty easy to trick people into thinking they're getting a much more costly perfume. If sandalwood is in this blend it is imperceptible to me - even at the very edges of the dry-down. The cedar is very good quality, smells more like Himalayan cedar to me, but it totally steals the show when it comes to the base notes. It's the same cedar that took the place of sandalwood in so many popular perfumes in the last 25 years - Moschino, some Chanels, Cacharel, YSL, etc.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1775420"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1775420#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1771268" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1771268" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Dawn.Valerie"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1693945"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1693945.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Dawn.Valerie" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1771268ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1771268" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1693945">Dawn.Valerie</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-28">02/28/23 05:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I got this perfume from my boyfriend and it became my signature scent without me even noticing it. I emptied a bottle within the year and rebought it immediately. It's a compliment getter and together with Lipstick Rose, the fragrance that made me aware that I'm really into powdery violette notes. It's also very niche where I live, so you're bound to be the only one wearing it wherever you are, which is a plus imo.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1771268"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1771268#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1755909" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1755909" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="aspirina"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/128870"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.128870.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="aspirina" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Givenchy/Eaudemoiselle-de-Givenchy-Ambre-Velours-18920.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.18920.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eaudemoiselle de Givenchy Ambre Velours"title="Eaudemoiselle de Givenchy Ambre Velours"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1755909ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1755909" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/128870">aspirina</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-09">02/09/23 10:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I got a mini bottle online. This very pretty, it's herbal and soft,  it has pronounced mimose, iris and violet with pale green notes. A little watery feeling...maybe lotus too?. After a while mimose and violet are the dominant notes, dry down is slightly woody. The ambroxan is here is pleasant, I don't perceive any harsh notes here.<br />
Do I need this? probably not. Do I want this? yeah..I think I will use all of mi mini bottle and then get a full size.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1755909"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1755909#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1749387" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1749387" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Fleurie20"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/21613"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.21613.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Fleurie20" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1749387ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1749387" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/21613">Fleurie20</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-01">02/01/23 19:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>To my nose this is violet throughout from the beginning till its complete disappearance. It does remind me of the harshness I encounter when I open a new box of dryer sheets.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1749387"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1749387#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1746254" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1746254" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="astralmonad870"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1555935"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1555935.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="astralmonad870" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dries-Van-Noten/Jardin-de-L-Orangerie-72594.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.72594.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Jardin de L'Orangerie"title="Jardin de L'Orangerie"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1746254ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1746254" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1555935">astralmonad870</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-28">01/28/23 18:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>At first this perfume was too strong and gave me a headache. Reminded me of violet candy or laundry detergent. Now it has grown on me and I own a 30 ml bottle. The violet scent overpowers everything elseI do not smell any of the mandarin orange in the top notebut its green quality is lovely and warm, almost tropical.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1746254"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1746254#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1745972" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1745972" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="u24masonl"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1291723"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1291723.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="u24masonl" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1745972ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1745972" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1291723">u24masonl</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-28">01/28/23 11:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>To me, this perfume smells of parma violets and freesias, plus a powdery soapiness. It is feminine, quite pretty, and I would say relatively classic. A pleasant, powdery daytime scent; not too distinctive but I quite like it. It's cute, without being childish.<br />
<br />
However, when I got into the car with my husband, he remarked: "wow, you smell lovely. What perfume is that??" <br />
<br />
He doesn't usually notice such things, which I remarked upon, but he said it smelled so unique it turned his head straight away. Goes to show how subjective perfume is!<br />
<br />
I think its projection is pretty good, although I am less convinced about its staying power. I love Penhaligon's as a perfumery and I will happily finish the 5ml sample. But will I purchase it again given its price tag? No. Penhaligon's has plenty of offerings which are more distinctive and spellbinding than this, in my view.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1745972"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1745972#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1725372" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1725372" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mocam"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1559118"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1559118.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mocam" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Mon-Guerlain-43297.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.43297.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mon Guerlain"title="Mon Guerlain"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1725372ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1725372" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1559118">mocam</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-04">01/04/23 19:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sweet violet, lipstick, powder, and heady florals. What more could a girl want? I cant think of many other fragrances that make me feel this feminine and elegant. This perfume is seriously dreamy. Its somewhere between Apres Londee and Narciso Poudree - vintage but incredibly wearable. noticeable, but not overpowering. I just find myself sniffing it over and over. I would say this is a great springtime scent because its so light and fresh, but really this could be a signature as well. I certainly would wear it any time of year.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1725372"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1725372#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1708645" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1708645" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="gpaisley"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1181355"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1181355.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="gpaisley" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1708645ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1708645" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1181355">gpaisley</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-13">12/13/22 16:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The Favourite is an absolutely stunning, feminine, regal, vintage, talc, cosmetic, billowing, powdery Marie Antoinette type of perfume. I was very excited to try this for a long time because of the references stating it was similar to Meteorites - which I found to be such an angelic, airy, sweet, sheer violet, iris, and rose cosmetic powder skin scent.<br />
<br />
To my surprise however, I found that The Favourite was actually quite dissimilar to Meteorites because The Favourite actually opens up with a slightly sour yellow talc powder accord - which gives it a much more heavier, dated, vintage, petina, type of boudoir powder feeling relative to the sweet, sheer, candied violet, Meteorite scent. They are both cosmetic compact powder scents, but The Favourite is much heavier, yellow, sour, billowing, talc powder scent compared to Meteorite. It must be the mimosa that makes the talc powder seem like a sour yellow talc, and it must be the ambroxan that gives The Favourite a much thicker billowing powdery aura, relative to Meteorite which goes on quite airy and sheer and stays close to the skin. <br />
<br />
After the opening sour yellow talc powder accord, The Favourite blossoms into a beautiful and sweeter cosmetic scent aided by the violet, iris, and rose that start coming through which adds a pink and purple powdery sweetness to balance the initial sour yellow powder accord. The Favourite reminds me very much of the following fragrances which I think share that same vintage sour yellow talc powder accord mixed with violet, iris, and/or rose: <br />
- l'Instant de Guerlain <br />
- l'Instant Magic Guerlain<br />
- J'Adore Voile de Parfum Dior  <br />
- l'Eau En Blanc Lolita Lempicka<br />
- Voulez-Vous Coucher Avec Moi Kilian <br />
<br />
I would say if you are looking for a light sweet innocent sheer candied violet and rose cosmetic powder skin scent, Meteorites is perfect for that. <br />
<br />
However The Favourite is a much more complex, thick, powdery scent that opens with a sour yellow talc accord and has a strong sillage likely due to the Ambroxan that holds all the notes together like a thick glue resulting in a powdery yellow, pink, purple, sweet, bitter, sour, cosmetic powder scent from what feels like a Victorian Era... a bold scent fit for a Queen!<br />
<br />
UPDATE: Just a little update to share that I recently re-tested THE FAVOURITE by Penhaligon and it smells extremely similar to METEORITES LE PARFUM EDT by Guerlain.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1708645"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1708645#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1706800" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1706800" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mercedes Luna"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1562633"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1562633.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mercedes Luna" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1706800ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1706800" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1562633">Mercedes Luna</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-11">12/11/22 03:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Pleasant, comforting, feminine scent. Completely see this as a signature scent. <br />
<br />
Among the mimosa, jasmine and amber I also get a pear note. Because of this is reminds me a bit of Prada Paradoxe. However, I much prefer this Penhalegon's version. <br />
<br />
It leans too feminine for me so I wont get much wear from this but would love to smell it on someone else. Although I am female, I prefer more unisex/masculine scents on my skin chemistry.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1706800"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1706800#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1693340" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1693340"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1693340#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1684949" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1684949" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="clairesque"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1347367"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1347367.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="clairesque" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Clean/Skin-35244.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.35244.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Skin"title="Skin"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1684949ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1684949" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1347367">clairesque</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-09">11/09/22 18:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Opens up as a clean, almost soapy musk; then gradually transforms into a much sweeter musk that mingles with powdery florals. Has a slight cosmetic vibe but it's not fully a makeup scent thanks to the musky base. I would be in LOVE with this scent if not for the mimosa (or perhaps it's the ambroxan i don't like?). I find it a little too dominating in this fragrance, adding an odd herbal nuance and generally giving it an "old-fashioned" feel.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1684949"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1684949#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1684719" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1662534" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mdevereaux888"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1556930"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1556930.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mdevereaux888" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Heartless-Helen-55442.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.55442.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Heartless Helen"title="Heartless Helen"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1662534ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1662534" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1556930">mdevereaux888</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-09">10/09/22 12:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The Favourite is now one of my favourites. The scent is so comforting just like the embrace of a mother. It is also very unique.Lasts on my skin for 3-4 hours. My husband also loves it on me as it is mild and pleasant to the nose.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1662534"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1662534#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1660521" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1660521" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="batemanment"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1505053"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1505053.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="batemanment" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Miss-Dior-Blooming-Bouquet-2023-78945.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.78945.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Miss Dior Blooming Bouquet (2023)"title="Miss Dior Blooming Bouquet (2023)"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1660521ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1660521" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1505053">batemanment</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-06">10/06/22 15:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Queen Elizabeth II would have loved this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1660521"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1660521#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1635554" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1635554" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="stardenise16"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1342391"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1342391.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="stardenise16" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chloe/Nomade-48434.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.48434.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Nomade"title="Nomade"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1635554ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1635554" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1342391">stardenise16</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-08-31">08/31/22 23:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The opening is fine but after that it turns into a lovely scent, so girly and soft. The Favourite its not my favorite from Penhaligons but I really like it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1635554"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1635554#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1631028" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1631028" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="CR95"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1516766"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1516766.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="CR95" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hermes/Twilly-d-Hermes-Eau-Ginger-67667.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.67667.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Twilly d'Herms Eau Ginger"title="Twilly d'Herms Eau Ginger"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1631028ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1631028" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1516766">CR95</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-08-25">08/25/22 08:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Floral and powdery. Beautiful but doesnt really last long. Girly, feminine. Non offensive. Doesnt have much sillage. One of my favourite Penhaligons. Very English, elegant and delicate. Luxurious. Would pour a bottle on myself to make it more powerful! Very clean and elegant. Not soapy though. Kind of the type like Chanel 5 eau de toilette.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1631028"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1631028#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1629876" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1629876" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kpop_stan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1543675"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1543675.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="kpop_stan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1629876ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1629876" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1543675">kpop_stan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-08-23">08/23/22 14:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>There's something endearingly innocent about this fragrance. Not childish or youthful, just... clean. I'm getting parma violets, bubble baths, cream and sugar. A statement floral fragrance without being too intense or overbearing. <br />
<br />
The thing I find really impressive about The Favourite is that I don't feel it has an "age" or even a "place". I think you could be in your late teens and enjoy it, or well into your 80s and still enjoy it. Wear it on a date, wear it to the office, wear it to bed! Could just be my own bias talking but this definitely feels like a universal fragrance to me.<br />
<br />
Though this won't be the bottle I run to buy first, that's not to say I won't be the proud owner of one in the future! It joins the pile of other scents from this house that, for the time being, I think I's be content just having the 10ml travel size to hand.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1629876"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1629876#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1609425" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1104101">Velvette</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-07-24">07/24/22 00:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This opened with an unexpected burst of .........  bubblegum, a million miles away from the image of the brand and the beautiful bottle. It faded very quickly into a pale powdery violet then the jasmine came through right at the end when it just smelled soapy. I would have loved to love this but it just doesn't work for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1609425"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1609425#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1594174" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1594174" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Suavis"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1408750"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1408750.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Suavis" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Electimuss/Puritas-61822.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.61822.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Puritas"title="Puritas"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1594174ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1594174" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1408750">Suavis</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-06-30">06/30/22 09:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a beautiful fragrance, floral and powdery. Very feminine, non-offensive, elegant and well behaved. There's a sort of innocence about The Favourite which is projected through the beautifully blended notes. <br />
The words that come to mind are: candid, innocent, girly, feminine, classy, classic, Spring, country cottage garden, a refreshing cup of Earl grey tea under a white-flower pergola.<br />
It leans more feminine, suitable for all ages.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1594174"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1594174#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1592336" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1592336" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="shewasgarbo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1496770"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1496770.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="shewasgarbo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1592336ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1592336" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1496770">shewasgarbo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-06-27">06/27/22 10:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A promising opening - the violets and iris blossom beautifully in an elegant symphony of powdery accords. The mimosa lends a dry touch, giving it a youthful edge. However, once the opening notes begin to fade, the heavy musk begins to rear its head. This musk turned very skanky on my skin, ageing the fragrance to something reminiscent of an old lady who has spent far too long in her powder room.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1592336"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1592336#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1588949" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1588949" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Saraheve97"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1489993"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1489993.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Saraheve97" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1588949ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1588949" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1489993">Saraheve97</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-06-21">06/21/22 18:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I so wanted to fall in love with the favourite, but that was not the case. I almost blind bought a full bottle because of everything I've heard about it. Let me start by saying I would still recommend this as something for others, just not for myself. <br />
<br />
The opening/mid notes are so beautiful. I expected something more powdery, but I wouldn't think powder immediately when I smell this. I smell orange prominently in the opening, and then it dries to a beautiful and classy floral combo. However, my problem is in the base notes. I am just not a fan of ambroxan. I thought it might just have been the JHAG usage of ambroxan that I didn't like, but apparently it's all ambroxan. This is so sad, but definitely specific to me, so I would still recommend trying it out.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1588949"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1588949#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1579317" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1579317" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="K&ouml;biD"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1160015"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1160015.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="K&ouml;biD" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Allure-Eau-de-Parfum-176.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.176.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Allure Eau de Parfum"title="Allure Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1579317ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1579317" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1160015">K&ouml;biD</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-06-07">06/07/22 03:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>In my opinion, this is the epitome of a female and non-offensive fragrance. The drydown is a soft flowery muskiness and even though not listed, I get the impression that there are also some roses in the flower mix. Maybe it is the color of the fragrance that plays tricksLuckily, the ambroxan is not sharp to my nose. It is for sure not a unique fragrance profile, but it is one of the smoother and more elegant ones that I have come across so far in the floral musk category.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1579317"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1579317#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1561470" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1561470" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Paula80"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/50645"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.50645.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Paula80" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Moresque/Oroluna-41460.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.41460.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Oroluna"title="Oroluna"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1561470ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1561470" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/50645">Paula80</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-11">05/11/22 03:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is such a lovely perfume! If you like powdery, musky fragrances, it is easy to fall in love with The Favourite.<br />
This is a bouquet of powdery flowers; mimosa and violet are the stars of the show - at least on my skin. Soft musk and creamy sandalwood in the base complement the whole composition.<br />
The Favourite smells sweet, powdery, 'fluffy' and so 'pink' but never juvenile. Maybe it's not the most complex perfume, but still beautiful.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1561470"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1561470#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1544239" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1544239" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="gothicromance"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1427081"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1427081.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="gothicromance" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Chanel-No-5-Eau-de-Parfum-40069.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.40069.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Chanel No 5 Eau de Parfum"title="Chanel No 5 Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1544239ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1544239" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1427081">gothicromance</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-04-15">04/15/22 15:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A lovely fragrance. On my skin the mimosa is a little tart at first, but within 30 minutes it dries down to a beautiful slightly sweet floral powder. Of the 9 fragrances I've sampled this week, this one got the strongest positive reaction from my husband; on the first day he nuzzled me multiple times and told me he liked my perfume. I think that means it's worth a full bottle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1544239"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1544239#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1515859" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1462544">tista17</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-03">03/03/22 12:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love this! It's girly, but a woman can wear it. It's soft, floral with sugar-sweetness. It makes me feel youthful and full of promise. When I first spray it I sometimes smell an herbal note --maybe a touch of dill, but then it goes away and you smell the powdery violet, iris and mimosa floral notes. The Favourite smells like pink fluffy, sugar flowers on top of a cake and I adore it. The dry-down is also so soft and wonderful. The pink bow and packaging matches this fragrance to a T.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1515859"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1515859#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1513279" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Not classy. Penhaligons need to bring back Iris Prima - it had way more depth. This easily could be a Lancme or Hugo boss seasonal that ends up in the clearance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1510231"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1510231#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1505112" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Excellent longevity.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1505112"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1505112#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1504115" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1504115" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MixedTastes"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1062856"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1062856.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MixedTastes" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/Parisienne-6493.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.6493.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Parisienne"title="Parisienne"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1504115ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1504115" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1062856">MixedTastes</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-02-14">02/14/22 07:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I dont know why I experienced this so drastically differently from all the reviews. I was expecting a soft, dreamy iris-freesia-violet, and hopefully an instant love (such a pretty bottle and evocative name!). But this exploded like a tropical fruit sherbet bomb on my skin and although it was fun to smell I absolutely do NOT want to smell like a fizzy, fruity candy. Then, just like that, the sweet shop  assault on my senses disappeared and it dried down to a linear, 100% Ambroxan.<br />
Hard pass, Im afraid.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1504115"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1504115#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1502934" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
