padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1369758">Controlledbyscent31</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-02-12">02/12/22 08:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Loved the bottle but its too powdery, soapy and Violet for me. <br />
Nice scent but it's more like a body wash scent for my taste.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1502934"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1502934#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1492194" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1492194" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="pearl-poetry"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1257584"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1257584.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="pearl-poetry" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Diptyque/Eau-Rose-14214.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.14214.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eau Rose"title="Eau Rose"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1492194ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1492194" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1257584">pearl-poetry</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-01-27">01/27/22 09:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The one perfume my significant other compliments every single time I wear it- the initial blast of mandarin, freesia, and violet is unabashedly optimistic. It quickly develops into something musky, powdery, sensual- never overly naughty, rather cheekily feminine.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1492194"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1492194#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1483522" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1483522" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Karinapricilla"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1389544"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1389544.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Karinapricilla" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Kajal/Kajal-III-85072.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.85072.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Kajal III"title="Kajal III"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1483522ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1483522" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1389544">Karinapricilla</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-01-14">01/14/22 23:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A very beautiful scent. Very powdery floral, i can really smell the violet, iris and mimosa here, this might be the most feminine perfume in my collection (in a good way). I cant smell the jasmine at all. It dries down to a soft musky skin scent. People say that the performance of this is quite weak but on me, it last 12 hours straight. No kidding. I sprayed this 4 times before bed at 9 pm, woke up and the scent is still there! On 11am the next day, i still smell the scent lingering on my skin. Wow.<br />
<br />
I layered this with lelabo another 13, and oh GOD it turns out amazing!! They both compliment each other so well as they both got the ambroxan note. Love!!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1483522"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1483522#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1480066" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1480066" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="antoniov"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1412066"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="antoniov" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1480066ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1480066" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82); I would say that longevity is at 1 to 2 hrs and sillage at arm length. It's definitely better than Endymion and Halfeti on me but lacks the wow factor. Could be a workplace perfume.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1480066"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1480066#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1478811" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It is too powdery and dries weird on my skin after a few minutes. There's a note on it that I don't understand and I kind of dislike it - something strong that's ruining the scent for me. <br />
The bottle is so nice though. I was going to blind buy this but good thing I tried a sample first.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1478811"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1478811#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1438973" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Powdery and floral. A bit too your "basic feminine fragrance" for me tho.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1416198"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1416198#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1383590" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1383590" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="blackribbons"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1368311"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1368311.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="blackribbons" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1383590ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1383590" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1368311">blackribbons</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-07-29">07/29/21 16:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>With violet and iris , I was expecting sugar sweet, but the cedar and other base notes tones it down... So instead of cavity-sugar cookies it's candied floral powder puff . Im pleasantly surprised and will be layer it with patch scents.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1383590"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1383590#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1364116" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1364116" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Salalome"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1233088"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1233088.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Salalome" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Etat-Libre-d-Orange/The-Ghost-In-The-Shell-69412.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.69412.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Ghost In The Shell"title="The Ghost In The Shell"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1364116ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1364116" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1233088">Salalome</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-06-22">06/22/21 10:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The frisia and violet are more prominent then the mimosa. I think many ppl don't know what mimosa actualy smells like. There is a mimosa note coming in the dry down yes, but first blast is clean fresia and violets boosted by ambroxan. Very pleasing. To me personaly extremly nostalgic cuz my Grandmother had a vintag body powderbox with a huge pink puff that smelled exactly like this! Lovely! Not grandma like but vintage feel inocent feminin clean.<br />
The powder was by Estee Lauder. Scented with Beautyfull or whithlonen or something.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1364116"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1364116#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1361667" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1361667" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="penguinrabbit"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1349583"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="penguinrabbit" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Clean/Fresh-Laundry-6763.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.6763.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fresh Laundry"title="Fresh Laundry"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1361667ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1361667" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1349583">penguinrabbit</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-06-17">06/17/21 15:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Powdery, floral. I was pleasantly surprised to find it wasn't rose (don't like simple rose scents too much). I should stress at no point does the label claim rose is in it I just assumed because it was pink. An iris, powdery bomb. Lasts ages on my skin. I expected this to be a scent I found merely OK but rather it is one of my favourites (pun intended) out of the scent library, probably second to Empressa. Ultra-feminine compared to what I'm used to (more subtle feminine or unisex scents) but I didn't find it suffocating which I thougth I might. Might not buy a full bottle but I'm definitely eyeing the Luna, Favourite, Empressa gift set on the Penhaligon's site.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1361667"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1361667#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1356935" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1356935" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Murmur123123"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1310171"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Murmur123123" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1356935ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1356935" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1310171">Murmur123123</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-06-09">06/09/21 03:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a lot more fresh and green, and a lot less sweet than I had expected. The mimosa scent in the opening is very prominent, and is similar to the mimosa scent in Jo Malone's Mimosa&amp;Cardamon. After about 2 hours, the scent becomes a lot more powdery and a bit sweeter, and sits a lot closer to the skin. Overall I find it a pleasant scent for the younger aged users, but nothing too attractive for me to want to buy a full bottle (especially considering the price point of Penhaligon's).</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1356935"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1356935#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1348956" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/132632">Vanian</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-05-13">05/13/21 08:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Stunning opening on my skin and wonderful beginning of the middle stage and all destroyed by some synthetic note which appears at some moment,  can't describe it, but does ruin the fragrance for me. This could have turned out to be absolute favourite of mine, otherwise. Sad, really sad. To all who love violets do try this, it might turn out to be love for you. However, try before you buy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1342660"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1342660#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1340762" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1340762" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jaclyncxh"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1314803"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1314803.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jaclyncxh" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/Artemisia-4547.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4547.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Artemisia"title="Artemisia"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1340762ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1340762" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1314803">jaclyncxh</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-05-10">05/10/21 01:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is the definition of pink and pretty whilst still being quite fresh and naturalistic. It's sweet but not too much, there's something breezy and slightly green probably the mimosa. It forms a beautiful plume of florals around me. It does feel a bit vintage smelling too probably due to the iris. Unfortunately it turns really strange, metallic and ammonic just a few minutes in on my skin. Such a shame, very sad. I've smelled it on my friend and it dries down to a creamy beautiful sandalwood with a hint of those fresh pink and green florals in the opening.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1340762"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1340762#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1332819" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1332819" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Printeza7"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/36097"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.36097.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Printeza7" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Atelier-Cologne/Rose-Anonyme-16013.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.16013.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Rose Anonyme"title="Rose Anonyme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1332819ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1332819" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/36097">Printeza7</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-04-26">04/26/21 17:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Wow!!! What a strange opening! Smells like food,some kind of balsamic vinegar but in a good way! When it settles I clearly can smell the Iris and hint of mimosa! It's kinda nice,but for me is not as floral as it should be considering the flower notes! Still like it though.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1332819"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1332819#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1311011" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1311011" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rosequeen"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1169399"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1169399.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="rosequeen" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Raphael/Replique-5132.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.5132.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Replique"title="Replique"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1311011ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1311011" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1169399">rosequeen</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-03-20">03/20/21 10:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The ultimate safe perfume.  If you're expecting/hoping for a big blowsy violet-iris bomb, you'll be sadly disappointed.  Or you didn't pay particular attention to the notes listed and figured there was rose in it because the juice is colored pink and the label is red, wrong again.  There is no rose anywhere in it.  I bought a mini-bottle, with the little pink thread-cord still on it, so clearly direct from the factory.  I can't blame a decant seller for watering it down.  <br />
<br />
I'd wonder why Penhaligon's made this if I didn't know how corporations work.  Someone important must have whined to Penhaligon's management that all their fragrances in the last 5 years or so were big oud and/or Middle Eastern bombs, or what looks like an oud bomb to someone who usually only wears florals.  I can hear the battle cry. "why can't you make at least one fragrance that real women like my Aunt Betty wear, or that I can give my 16-year-old daughter and she won't smell like a tramp?"  And The Favourite was born.  <br />
<br />
There's nothing horrible about it.  But nothing memorable either.  I can barely smell it even an hour later.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1311011"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1311011#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1307846" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1307846" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="angelbebe75"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1015008"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1015008.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="angelbebe75" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/Libre-56077.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.56077.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Libre"title="Libre"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1307846ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1307846" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1015008">angelbebe75</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-03-14">03/14/21 16:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I bought a mini but now I want a full bottle cuz its pink lol...Smells like powdery violet. Does anybody know if it is limited or permanent?</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1307846"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1307846#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1276788" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1276788" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="delicatefabric"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1015232"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1015232.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="delicatefabric" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Abercrombie-Fitch/Ellwood-White-Bergamot-67421.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.67421.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ellwood White Bergamot"title="Ellwood White Bergamot"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1276788ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1276788" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1015232">delicatefabric</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-01-16">01/16/21 02:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sweet, seductive, scrumptious, everything a Victoria's Secret fragrance aspires to be.<br />
The pure soapy bouquet gives way to this fragrance's true colours in about half an hour. The freshness of mandarin and freesia is upstaged by an unexpected lactonic note from the mimosa and musk, which is complemented well by the powdery iris. The sensation evoked is intimate and intoxicating, like burying your face into the neck of your 'favourite'.<br />
This is a true EDP in its sillage and longevity, and will be suffocating if used in excess.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1276788"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1276788#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1270847" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1270847" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lauren.smells"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1290807"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1290807.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="lauren.smells" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Prada/Prada-Paradoxe-75668.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75668.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Prada Paradoxe"title="Prada Paradoxe"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1270847ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1270847" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1290807">lauren.smells</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-01-05">01/05/21 08:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Ok hear me out, because this is a tad strange. Does anyone else smell...pickles...in the dry down? I know others have experienced that issue with MJ Decadence, but for some reason I detect a faint whiff of sweet dill in The Favourite. Don't get me wrong: this is a delightful, classy fragrance. To its credit, I liked it so much that even *after* noticing the faint pickle smell, I continued to apply it until my tester had run out. Its multiple layers reveal themselves in a really enjoyable way, and you can tell that it's good quality. I might acquire another sample to see if this was an isolated issue, but until then, I prefer to only smell dill when I walk into a deli. Please someone let me know that I'm not alone! So, overall: probably not a safe blind buy, but do try it for yourself! Perhaps The Favourite is testing me to see if I'm worthy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1270847"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1270847#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1257932" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1249716">zestybloom</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-12-07">12/07/20 13:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>For me this is the most pretty scent I have, at first its fresh and soft like when you were a young girl and you smelled your first beautiful perfume, then very fast it smells a little salty soapy floral, it dries down with that new sparking smell almost metallic but very very light and then to beautiful powder every time I wear this and my son or husband give me a hug they say wow you smell so good I think its my favorite perfume right now, very easy to wear just soft pretty and interesting</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1257932"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1257932#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1196588" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1196588" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="woodlandwalk"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/11394"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.11394.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="woodlandwalk" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Kingdom-Scotland/Metamorphic-53987.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53987.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Metamorphic"title="Metamorphic"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1196588ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1196588" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/11394">woodlandwalk</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-07-06">07/06/20 08:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Pretty, fresh-floral notes of freesia, mimosa, violet and iris, relaxing on a soft bed of sandalwood, to my nose it has an elegant garden-party mood  itll suit women of all ages who seek a contemporary, flirty-feminine scent for spring and summer.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1196588"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1196588#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1172173" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1172173" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jenge"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/432632"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.432632.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jenge" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Gris-Dior-48387.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.48387.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gris Dior"title="Gris Dior"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1172173ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1172173" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/432632">Jenge</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-05-06">05/06/20 08:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a love for me. Powdery, fresh, floral, clean, and feminine. It combines shampoo and powder to my nose, probably due to the freesia. The violet is there, but not center stage. It was reminding me of Meteorites Le Parfum, but side by side, The Favourite is softer and way less sweet and fruity. Theres something peppery to my nose, but I get that in a lot of perfumes that other people dont! It may be the musk. Its pretty linear as well. It stays very long on my skin and all day on clothes with the powdery part coming and going most noticeably on clothes. I LOVE the powderiness in this!! <br />
I think this is an easy, fresh, carefree, perfume that is fitting perfectly with Springtime in the US. Its also uplifting and optimistic during lockdown. When we can travel again, I can see using this while traveling to stay feeling fresh and awake and not offending anyone. I adore that pink bottle and velvet bow! I think its a little too expensive as its not groundbreaking, but its really well tempered and refined.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1172173"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1172173#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1170075" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1170075" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Annabear"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1039259"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1039259.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Annabear" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfum-d-Empire/Eau-Suave-5625.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.5625.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eau Suave"title="Eau Suave"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1170075ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1170075" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1039259">Annabear</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-05-01">05/01/20 00:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I received a free sample of this fragrance. Its pretty, a cool floral in a very British tradition, slightly aloof, composed and elegant. Nothing groundbreaking for the cost and with mediocre longevity. Interestingly, it comes on hot and strong on application, where its hard to ignore as the power of freesia assaults the senses, but about 20 minutes in, it settles down to a ubiquitous floral. An hour later its impossible to discern on the skin.<br />
Youd have to really love this before investing, and this comes from a perennial blind buyer.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1170075"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1170075#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1168701" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1168701" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kimber26"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/974058"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kimber26" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jovoy-Paris/Psychedelique-13462.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.13462.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Psychedelique"title="Psychedelique"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1168701ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1168701" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/974058">Kimber26</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-04-27">04/27/20 11:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>DO NOT BLIND BUY THIS!!!<br />
<br />
According to the description by the House, it should had been a powdery, elegant and mellow fragrant. However, on my skin, this is an overpowering fragrance being pungent, thick and cloying.<br />
<br />
Yes, it can be powdery, slightly floral, but only in the opening. <br />
<br />
At first, mandarine and bergamot comes with violet, a very refreshing and comfy start. Few minutes later, freesia kicks away that breeze and brings out mimosa and iris. As soon as the powdery facet is revealed, strange things starts to come up. I start to pick up some scratchy sourness along with the powdery floral accord.  An hour or so, a sweaty sour and metallic accord completely takes over the whole game. Oh! Dear, the game last FOREVER, even though I tried to scrub it off so hard, it stays for a day.<br />
<br />
The sales assistant said that they were mimicking their Luna, Artemisia and Iris Prima. But to me, its not that mouth-watering LUNA; it is not that soft and mellow Artemisia; it is neither that beautiful powdery Iris Prima. If that tribute say was true, then it is just an aggressive, theatrical horrible Copy of the three masterpiece. <br />
<br />
I cant find even a hint of elegance inside. There is no milky sandalwood nor transparent ambroxan; not even a bit of clean white musk. I decanted some for my friends just to see if thats just my skin chemistry. And of course, we have the same experience. This is by far the worst by the House, even worse than the nauseating Paithani. At least they didnt create Paithani based on any previous works.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1168701"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1168701#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1152738" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1152738" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="shushkin"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/106159"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.106159.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="shushkin" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/4160-Tuesdays/White-Queen-51566.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.51566.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="White Queen"title="White Queen"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1152738ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1152738" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/106159">shushkin</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-03-07">03/07/20 03:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I've just received a sample. Very nice. Not too sweet. Natural and sparkling.<br />
The iris and violet are as much present as the freesia and orange at the start. The freesia, iris and orange actually become even more evident with time. A bit of sandalwood in the base.<br />
It fades quite peppery from the freesia with a little violet and sandalwood. <br />
I think it's a very British scent that is very suitable for an upmarket young lady. Feminine, sparkling and inoffensive.<br />
I could easily imagine Megan or Katherine loving it.<br />
Average sillage and longevity.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1152738"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1152738#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                    </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-positive-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Positive Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">

padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1152738" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="shushkin"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/106159"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.106159.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="shushkin" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/4160-Tuesdays/White-Queen-51566.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.51566.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="White Queen"title="White Queen"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1152738ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1152738" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/106159">shushkin</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-03-07">03/07/20 03:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I've just received a sample. Very nice. Not too sweet. Natural and sparkling.<br />
The iris and violet are as much present as the freesia and orange at the start. The freesia, iris and orange actually become even more evident with time. A bit of sandalwood in the base.<br />
It fades quite peppery from the freesia with a little violet and sandalwood. <br />

I could easily imagine Megan or Katherine loving it.<br />
Average sillage and longevity.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1152738"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1152738#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1725372" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1725372" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mocam"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1559118"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1559118.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mocam" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Mon-Guerlain-43297.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.43297.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Mon Guerlain"title="Mon Guerlain"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1725372ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1725372" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1559118">mocam</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-04">01/04/23 19:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sweet violet, lipstick, powder, and heady florals. What more could a girl want? I cant think of many other fragrances that make me feel this feminine and elegant. This perfume is seriously dreamy. Its somewhere between Apres Londee and Narciso Poudree - vintage but incredibly wearable. noticeable, but not overpowering. I just find myself sniffing it over and over. I would say this is a great springtime scent because its so light and fresh, but really this could be a signature as well. I certainly would wear it any time of year.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1725372"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1725372#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1196588" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
