align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1196588"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1196588#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1423472" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1423472" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="unconquerable"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1398221"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="unconquerable" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1423472ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1423472" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1398221">unconquerable</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-10-06">10/06/21 11:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Think : you're at the opera and the lady sitting in front of you put A LOT of hairspray on. But like a boujee hairspray. Also, she wears velvet (for some reason). The opera is very old but very luxurious, slightly dusty but still grand. That's the vibe of the perfume. I love it, sadly it doesn't last long at all :(</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1423472"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1423472#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1791541" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1791541" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kotikina"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1498532"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1498532.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kotikina" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Attar-Collection/Khaltat-Night-38133.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.38133.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Khaltat Night"title="Khaltat Night"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1791541ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1791541" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1498532">Kotikina</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-24">03/24/23 09:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It is complex: feminine, classy, a little bit powdery. <br />
What I love about Penhaligon's - that their fragrances inspire my imagination and evoke images in my mind.<br />
<br />
I imagine an ingenue Victorian lady wearing this for a spring/summer ball. She comes from a good family, most likely aristocratic. Plays piano, paints, and is 'accomplished' as Victorians used to say. She is romantic enough to dream about love poems being dedicated to her, yet can come across a bit restrained and aloof: might fall in love, but will not lose her mind and do something indecent, such as eloping with a gentleman. Maybe Daphne from Bridgerton could rock it.<br />
<br />
Usually violet is a difficult note for me - as much as I wanted to love Guerlain's Insolence, it was just too much. The Favourite is strong on violet, but it is also quite strong on mimosa. There is some iris too, but very soft. Could be worn every day with an elegant outfit (definitely NOT jeans+trainers scent) or to the theatre. Noblesse oblige :) It is evocative of old times, but doesn't smell dated.<br />
<br />
As for the price tag: considering how expensive designers' fragrances became, this is a bargain (much cheaper than Penhaligon's portraits collection).<br />
The performance is actually excellent  - if you want sillage, it is there!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1791541"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1791541#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="59836" sentiment="positive"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-negative-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Negative Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent1168701" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1168701" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kimber26"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/974058"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kimber26" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jovoy-Paris/Psychedelique-13462.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.13462.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Psychedelique"title="Psychedelique"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1168701ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1168701" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/974058">Kimber26</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-04-27">04/27/20 11:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>DO NOT BLIND BUY THIS!!!<br />
<br />
According to the description by the House, it should had been a powdery, elegant and mellow fragrant. However, on my skin, this is an overpowering fragrance being pungent, thick and cloying.<br />
<br />
Yes, it can be powdery, slightly floral, but only in the opening. <br />
<br />
At first, mandarine and bergamot comes with violet, a very refreshing and comfy start. Few minutes later, freesia kicks away that breeze and brings out mimosa and iris. As soon as the powdery facet is revealed, strange things starts to come up. I start to pick up some scratchy sourness along with the powdery floral accord.  An hour or so, a sweaty sour and metallic accord completely takes over the whole game. Oh! Dear, the game last FOREVER, even though I tried to scrub it off so hard, it stays for a day.<br />
<br />
The sales assistant said that they were mimicking their Luna, Artemisia and Iris Prima. But to me, its not that mouth-watering LUNA; it is not that soft and mellow Artemisia; it is neither that beautiful powdery Iris Prima. If that tribute say was true, then it is just an aggressive, theatrical horrible Copy of the three masterpiece. <br />
<br />
I cant find even a hint of elegance inside. There is no milky sandalwood nor transparent ambroxan; not even a bit of clean white musk. I decanted some for my friends just to see if thats just my skin chemistry. And of course, we have the same experience. This is by far the worst by the House, even worse than the nauseating Paithani. At least they didnt create Paithani based on any previous works.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1168701"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1168701#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1609425" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1609425" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Velvette"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1104101"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1104101.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Velvette" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Versace/Versace-Pour-Femme-Dylan-Turquoise-62966.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.62966.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Versace Pour Femme Dylan Turquoise"title="Versace Pour Femme Dylan Turquoise"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1609425ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1609425" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1104101">Velvette</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-07-24">07/24/22 00:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This opened with an unexpected burst of .........  bubblegum, a million miles away from the image of the brand and the beautiful bottle. It faded very quickly into a pale powdery violet then the jasmine came through right at the end when it just smelled soapy. I would have loved to love this but it just doesn't work for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1609425"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1609425#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2151734" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2151734" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="heartbeam"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2119696"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2119696.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="heartbeam" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Noble-Blush-98937.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.98937.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Noble Blush"title="Noble Blush"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2151734ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2151734" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2119696">heartbeam</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-10">05/10/24 10:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Thought this was going to be a sweet, rosy, powdery fragrance like Teint de Neige (I got this recommended because I love TdN) but it reminds me of a less sweet and more soapy Oriana by PDM; not a fan of either unfortunately. I never checked the Fragrantica page for the notes so imagine my surprise when I got hit by a soapy citrus bomb. I wouldnt have expected it at all from the bottle I saw at the Pengaligons store!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="2151734"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=2151734#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2299395" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2299395" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bkingstar"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2219962"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2219962.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="bkingstar" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jovoy-Paris/Remember-Me-49435.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.49435.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Remember Me"title="Remember Me"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2299395ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2299395" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2219962">bkingstar</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-29">09/29/24 16:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells like Daisy eau so fresh and has a very basic scent DNA that reminds me of many other floral perfumes Ive tried. The bottle is very beautiful so I wish I enjoyed this but I just wish it was more unique</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="2299395"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=2299395#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1348956" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1348956" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kittensrevenge"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1342817"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1342817.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kittensrevenge" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1348956ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1348956" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1342817">Kittensrevenge</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-05-25">05/25/21 05:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>An interesting opening of freesia and citrus, but the dry down is sheer parma violets and very little else. I'll be passing this along.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="59836"comment_id="1348956"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html?ccid=1348956#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="59836" sentiment="negative"></reviews-infinity>

                if (lang == 'DE') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.de").replace(/designers/, "Designer").replace(/perfume/, "Parfum") });
                if (lang == 'ES') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.es").replace(/designers/, "disenador") });
                if (lang == 'FR') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.fr").replace(/designers/, "designer").replace(/perfume/, "parfum") });
                if (lang == 'CS') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.cz").replace(/designers/, "designer") });
                if (lang == 'IT') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.it").replace(/designers/, "designer") });
                if (lang == 'RU') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.ru") });
                if (lang == 'PL') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.pl").replace(/designers/, "marki").replace(/perfume/, "perfumy") });
                if (lang == 'PT') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.com.br").replace(/designers/, "desenhista") });
                if (lang == 'EL') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.gr").replace(/designers/, "designer") });
                if (lang == 'ZH') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.asia").replace(/designers/, "designer") });
                if (lang == 'NL') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.nl").replace(/designers/, "ontwerper").replace(/perfume/, "parfum") });
                if (lang == 'SR') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.punmiris.com").replace(/designers/, "dizajner").replace(/perfume/, "parfem") });
                if (lang == 'RO') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.ro").replace(/designers/, "creatori").replace(/perfume/, "parfum") });
                if (lang == 'AR') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragranticarabia.com").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
                if (lang == 'UK') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.ua").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
                if (lang == 'MN') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.mn").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
                if (lang == 'HE') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.co.il").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
            });
</script>


<script  data-cfasync="false">
    // Check that service workers are supported
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        // Use the window load event to keep the page load performant
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('/service-worker.js?v=rtgFFe5cbbe5e5f689826b719ace22a5b2a11');
        });
    }
</script>
<script>
    $(document).ready(function () {
        $('#fragranticaloader').fadeOut(20);
    });
</script>
</body>
</html>
